CHAT.comment: it is possible that speaker identified as Fat is actually Chi's grandfather (MOT's father) and that MAL is Chi's father; on the one hand , FAT seems to be in position of authority in the family; on the other , MAL's voice bears a strong resemblance to that of father on toy play tape; also , MOT's father does seem to be a presence in the household , judging from his appearance in book reading segment
